lead_paragraph: The American Bryan Clay led the decathlon at the Hypo Meeting yesterday in Götzis, Austria, after the world-record holder, Roman Sebrle of the Czech Republic, dropped out because of muscle problems. Clay led with 4,521 points through five events, followed by Dmitriy Karpov of Kazakhstan with 4,473.
